item.description:
Parking is in not numbered places by softball field, My address is

226 Prospect st. rte 287, Wethersfield

(Mitchell on the park apartments) next to ambulance and nature

Menu is chicken with stuffing, ham, potatoes, sweet potatoes, green bean casserole, salad, strawberries, ice cream, chiccolate pie plus much more, please bring your choice of beverage and please bring your favorite dish to share.

-- my cellÂ is 5083803737

Let's celebrate Spring, Easter and Passover together.

then let's go to the movies

Nancy
